channel.title: Commands help pi
channel.description: how can i make another person use the same commands like ::givemod like two can only use it. if any knows please help me.

item.title: Commands help pi
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

you can use wet deams method or just copy/paste the command again with the second name. worked for my server.

ps. wet dreams try to be nice plox. there is no shame in trying to learn. im just learning too and it realy is pretty dificult to get started with.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help pi
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner name") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner name"))) { try { String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 1; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Thats for multiple names.

I swear mopar is becoming stupider and stupider.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help pi
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { try { String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been given mod status by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 1; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
